summary: **Rugrats** is an American animated TV show about a group of toddlers—Tommy, Chuckie, Phil, and Lil—and their everyday adventures, which they imagine as big excursions. Created by Arlene Klasky, Gábor Csupó, and Paul Germain for Nickelodeon, it premiered in 1991 and ran for nine seasons with 172 episodes. The series also spawned three movies and spin-offs like **All Grown Up!** and **Rugrats Pre-School Daze**. It won over 20 awards and was very popular, being one of the longest-running animated series. A reboot premiered on Paramount+ in 2021.
title: Rugrats
